# GitHub Secrets Configuration

## Required Secrets

Configure these secrets in your GitHub repository:
**Settings → Secrets and variables → Actions → New repository secret**

### 1. SONATYPE_USERNAME
Your Sonatype Central Portal username (email or username)

### 2. SONATYPE_PASSWORD
Your Sonatype Central Portal password or token

### 3. GPG_PRIVATE_KEY
Your GPG private key in base64 format (see below)

### 4. GPG_PASSPHRASE
```
khraila3ra/@2EWQ1992Xpgxa
```

---

## Your GPG Private Key (Base64)

Copy the entire base64 string below and paste it as the value for `GPG_PRIVATE_KEY` secret:

```

```

---

## How to Set Up Secrets

1. Go to: https://github.com/ayoubarka/PixaCompose/settings/secrets/actions
2. Click "New repository secret"
3. Add each secret one by one with the exact name and value
4. After all 4 secrets are configured, the GitHub Action will work correctly

---

## Verify Setup

After setting up secrets, test by creating a tag:

```bash
git tag -a v1.0.1 -m "Release version 1.0.1"
git push origin v1.0.1
```

The GitHub Action will automatically trigger and publish to Maven Central.
